title: Font help!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130411210940im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontquestion_5156.jpg)

Can anyone tell me what font this is? I need it for my wedding invitations and I'm completely stumped! Your help is very much appreciated!! :)
author: starlily

comments.content: @ Jan: My apologies for initially pegging this incorrectly as Ambassador Script. I quickly realized my mistake and corrected it prior to seeing your post. I'll stop stumbling around the dance floor and just watch in amazement at your unbelievable ability to ID fonts.
Yeah, I know. Everything is fine.
